import React from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import { trackButtonClick, trackConsultationClick } from '../../utils/analytics'; const HeroSection: React.FC = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (

{t('hero.title')}

{t('hero.subtitle')}

{t('hero.features.pciCompliant')} {t('hero.features.uptime')} {t('hero.features.integrations')}
trackConsultationClick('Hero CTA')} > {t('hero.getStarted')} trackButtonClick('View Pricing', 'Hero Section')} > {t('hero.viewPricing')}
{/* Payment Provider Logos */}
{/* Stripe */}
Stripe
{/* Visa */}
Visa
{/* Ethereum */}
Ethereum
{/* Apple Pay */}
Apple Pay
{/* Adyen */}
Adyen
{/* BitPay */}
BitPay
{/* Mastercard */}
Mastercard
{/* Enhanced Security & Trust Badges */}
PCI DSS Level 1
Certified
99.9% SLA
Uptime
Certified
Partners
256-bit SSL
Encryption
); }; export default HeroSection;
